targets.refId: Dynamic measures - Total carbon emissions - sorted

targets.query:
//Carbon emission (extrapolated to 1h x num_hours)

num_hours = float(v: 24*${nr_days})

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "apic-switch")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pIn")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
      _value: float(v:r._value) * ${cost}/1000.0 * num_hours,
    })
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "name"])
  |> yield()

//Cost based on EUR variable (extrapolated to 1h x num_hours)

num_hours = float(v: 24*${nr_days})

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-sysadmin-fretta-envmon-ui:environment/oper/power/location/pem_attributes" and
  r._field == "system_power_input")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
      _value: float(v:r._value) * ${cost}/1000.0 * num_hours,
    })
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "source"])
  |> yield()

num_hours = float(v: 24 * ${nr_days})

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-sysadmin-asr9k-envmon-ui:environment/oper/power/location/pem_attributes" and
  r._field == "system_power_input")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
      _value: float(v:r._value) * ${cost}/1000.0 * num_hours,
    })
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "source"])
  |> yield()
targets.refId: Dynamic measurements - Total carbon emissions - sorted

targets.query:
num_hours = float(v: 24 * ${nr_days})

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "asr9k_power")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time", "source"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> pivot(columnKey: ["_field"], rowKey: ["source"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r.voltage1 * r.current1 + r.voltage2 * r.current2) / 1000000}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "source", "cc"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
      _value: float(v:r._value) * ${cost}/1000.0 * num_hours,
    })
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "source"])
  |> yield()
targets.refId: Dynamic measurements - Total carbon emissions - sorted
Dynamic measurements - Total Carbon emissions per hour - sorted

targets.query:
num_hours = float(v: 24 * ${nr_days})

src = from(bucket: "bucket1")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XE-environment-oper:environment-sensors/environment-sensor" and r._field == "current_reading" and (r.name == "PEM Iout" or r.name == "PEM Vout"))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time", "source"], desc: true)
  |> unique(column: "source")
  |> pivot(columnKey: ["name"], rowKey: ["source", "location"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r["PEM Iout"] * r["PEM Vout"])}))
  |> group(columns: ["source", "cc"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
      _value: float(v:r._value) * ${cost}/1000.0 * num_hours,
    })
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "source"])
  |> yield()
